extendedInfo.description: Next Switch Widget is a kind of tools that is based on Next Launcher 3D. It provides you a fast way to turn on/off the functions in common use, such as Wifi, GPS, brightness, screen lock, bluetooth etc. The glorious visual elements and dynamic effects of Next Switch Widget will absolutely give you unique visual enjoyment. Notice:If Next switch widget can't be displayed on your Next Launcher, maybe your Next Launcher is an unpaid version. It's note safe. Please uninstall this copy and install Next Launcher in Google Play if you like it.Available Size:-4x1-1x1Actions:- Functions: Wifi, Ringer, Brightness, Bluetooth, MobileNetwork, GPS, Auto-sync, Airplane mode, Vibrate, ScreenTimeout, Lock screen, Ringer volume, Media volume- Upward and downward gesture:more switches- Tap âmoreâ button:toggle position modificationUnable to uninstall?To lock screen, the widget must be set as the device administrator. Once it's done, you cannot uninstall the widget directly. If you happen to uninstall it, you can follow the instruction below:Enter the "Settings" menu -> "Location and security" -> "Select device administrators" -> Make sure "Next Switch Widget" is not selected -> Then uninstall the widgetHow to uninstall?Since Next Switch Widget has the right to lock screen, to UNINSTALL it, you must execute the steps below first.Press the "menu" button in home screen of Next Launcher -> Select "Settings" -> Select "Location and Security" -> Select "Select device administrators" -> Make sure "Next Switch Widget" is not selected. Then try uninstall the widget like other usual applications.Some toggles may be out of work after your Next Switch Widget is upgraded. Please refer to the instruction below to figure them out.For the WiFi toggle (the instruction may be varied a little in different phones)Settings -> Wireless and network -> Wi-Fi settings -> Unselect âWiFiâ -> Then try the WiFi toggle in the widget to open the WiFi network.For the Bluetooth toggle (the instruction may be varied a little in different phones)Settings -> Wireless and network -> Bluetooth settings -> Unselect âBluetoothâ -> Then try the Bluetooth toggle in the widget to open the Bluetooth function.For the screen lock toggle (the instruction may be varied a little in different phones)Settings -> Location and security -> Select device administrators -> Unselect âNext Switch Widgetâ -> Then try the âscreen lockâ toggle in the widget to lock the screen.How to add Next Widgets to your home screen?- Long press home screen of Next Launcher. Press the Widget option and choose the widget you like. Make sure you have enough room for the widget.If you encounter any problems or have any suggestions for our Next Launcher, please do not hesitate to tell us. Thank you very much!E-mail: golauncher@goforandroid.comFacebook: www.facebook.com/NextLauncherGoogle+: https://plus.google.com/u/1/104540424317126374535/posts

reviews.title: Can\'t uninstall !!!!
reviews.comment: I installed this when I was using Next Launcher, but NL crashed my contacts and other things in my S3. I want to remove it and I can\'t. Help me please!
reviews.author: Astrid Marshall Hill

reviews.title: fix this bug
reviews.comment: 4x2 size switch is working properly.. but the 1x1 switch is not.. wen I play a game or something and rerurn to home screen .. it says next launcher is loading den all the swith turns into wifi button.. need to delete them and add every time when I open an app. pLz fix this .. ill give 5\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205 for sure..
reviews.author: prashanth SV

reviews.title: Need to set switches again and again
reviews.comment: A good app..but every time I set the switches it runs properly only for sometime and then I need to reset the switches because for some reason the set switches vanish..
reviews.author: yaseen sheikh

reviews.title: I\'m having no issues
reviews.comment: I read some of the other reviews here and I gotta say my galaxy s3 works fine with it...I do recommend clean master to help with and processing issues
reviews.author: Roberto Ramirez

reviews.title: Comfortable
reviews.comment: I used nextlauncher make my phone different.
reviews.author: Fahrul Rosy

reviews.title: Good concept, but buggy
reviews.comment: I have been using 3 of the single switches, one for Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and GPS. It\'s a fantastic idea, unfortunately, every time my device reboots, my switches all get turned into Wi-Fi switches, or in one case, just blank. This wouldn\'t be as bad if I could just long-press and re-select what the switch is, but I have to remove it and add another one. This happened on my Galaxy S2 and my Nook HD.
reviews.author: Erin Nelson

reviews.title: Somethings wrong
reviews.comment: The widget is really wonderful to look at. But there should\'ve been more tabs at fold mode. But the most terible thing was. After installing, it crashed all the apps on my ext sd card. I am really upset about it.
reviews.author: Sakib Tanvir

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: I set the switches but they need to be added again later. It resets to default switches. I love it but the reset issue needs to be fixed.
reviews.author: Ann Marie Franklin

reviews.title: Pls fix it...why cant uninstall..
reviews.comment: I wanna remove it.. Pls fix it quick, thank you very much
reviews.author: Yap Pheiyong

reviews.title: Looks good
reviews.comment: Works great on my galaxy s4.
reviews.author: Robert Veliz

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: It\'s a good idea and looks decent (not great), but the switch only works once. After that it just takes you to the settings screen.
reviews.author: Russell Bradford

reviews.title: Looks great but needs quick fix
reviews.comment: Like other reviewers, I too have the problem of the switches returning to default layout after some time.  I haven\'t figured out any pattern for it yet.  Reboot is an obvious one, but it\'s happened a few times a day without any reboot or other system event.  Using it with Next 3D launcher on my HTC One with Android 4.1.2.  I want to keep it but it\'s aggravating to have to keep re-setting the layout and switches all the time.  Will get 5 stars when this is fixed!
reviews.author: Robert Burks

reviews.title: Not stable. Individual switches keep changing to a different setting.
reviews.comment: Constantly changing to WiFi or blank switch every time phone reboots or Next Launcher reloads. Will be happy to give 4 or even 5 Stars once this is fixed. My phone is Motorola Razr Maxx.
reviews.author: Victor St.James

reviews.title: Good design
reviews.comment: 4x1 can\'t sort always returned to default order, 1x1 after reboot always returned to wi-fi type,

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Switches automatically revert to default and now I can\'t even change them to the switch that I want.
